question: 狼男
sourceMnemonic: What’s another word for a <kanji>wolf</kanji> <kanji>man</kanji>? A <vocabulary>werewolf</vocabulary>, obviously.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You learned the reading for <ja>狼</ja> in both the kanji and the vocabulary word. The reading for <ja>男</ja> comes from the vocabulary <ja>男</ja>. Put them together and you get <reading><ja>おおかみおとこ</ja></reading>. Awoooo.
